title: Himi 427
lyrics:
7.6.7.5. loua
1.
Ngāue, tangata, ngāue,
He ‘oku ha’u ‘a e pō:
‘Oua ‘e fakahāuē,
‘Oua mālōlō.
O’i pē, tama, o’i;
Hanga ‘o ngāue leva;
‘Ā pē kei pongipongi,
‘Oua mo’umohea.
2.
Ngoue ho ‘api, mu’a,
‘Ai ke ma’ala’ala:
Tō pe ‘akau ‘e fua,
Tā he talatala.
He ko e fai tō ta’u ē
Ki he ‘amui atu;
‘Ikai ha toe ngāue
‘Oka tā ‘a e tapu.
3.
Fai pē, tangata, fai pē
‘Ofa ho kaunga’api:
Si’ono laumālie
Hono ‘atamai.
‘Oua faifaimālie
He fe’aonga’aki,
He ko e taimi si’i pē
Pea ngata ai.
4.
Fai pē, tangata, fai pē,
‘Oua e fiungofua;
Ngāue he ngoue vaine,
Ngoue he ‘Otua.
Kataki he pupuha,
Fua he faingata’a;
He ‘oku toe houa
Pea tō ‘a e la’ā.
5.
Sio, tangata, sio
Ki he ‘amui atu,
‘A e me’a te ke ‘ilo,
‘Oka tā ‘a e tapu.
Sio he fu’u totongi,
Sio he mālōlō.
O’i, tangata, o’i
‘Oku haʻu ‘a e pō.*
